page.title: 01LLANBRYNMAIR IS OUR AREA
page.content: Our area is fairly hilly,peaceful and clean and has plenty of birds,animals and trees to attract visitors.The highest mountain is Newydd Fynyddog which is 427m above sea level. Llanbrynmair is in the county of Powys.All the people in our area can speak Welsh and English.People of this area live in farms and hamlets.The hamlets are called{Wynnstay,Tafolwern, {Bont,Llan and Dolfach.}There are three garages and shops in this area and there is one cafe which is open in the summer only.The {Wynnstay Arms}is the only hotel.We have four chapels and one church.There is one school in the area which has 74 pupils.English people who move into the area learn to speak Welsh in Welsh classes at the Community Centre if they wish to do so. { }
